greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First differences of A172310.
comment: Number of L-toothpicks added to the L-toothpick structure of A172310 at the n-th stage.
link: David Applegate, Omar E. Pol and N. J. A. Sloane, The Toothpick Sequence and Other Sequences from Cellular Automata, Congressus Numerantium, Vol. 206 (2010), 157-191. [There is a typo in Theorem 6: (13) should read u(n) = 4.3^(wt(n-1)-1) for n >= 2.]
N. J. A. Sloane, Catalog of Toothpick and Cellular Automata Sequences in the OEIS
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jan 31 2010
ext: Corrected by _David Applegate_ and _Omar E. Pol_. More terms beyond a(22) from _David Applegate_, Mar 26 2016
